an9.34:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā sāriputto rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
an9.34:1.2: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an9.34:1.5: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā udāyī āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
an9.34:1.6: “kiṃ panettha, āvuso sāriputta, sukhaṃ yadettha natthi vedayitan”ti?
an9.34:1.7: “Etadeva khvettha, āvuso, sukhaṃ yadettha natthi vedayitaṃ.
an9.34:1.10: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā,
an9.34:1.14: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā—
an9.34:1.16: Yaṃ kho, āvuso, ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, idaṃ vuccatāvuso, kāmasukhaṃ.
an9.34:2.1: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:2.2: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno iminā vihārena viharato kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:2.3: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, sukhino dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya yāvadeva ābādhāya;
an9.34:2.4: evamevassa te kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti. Svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:2.5: Yo kho panāvuso, ābādho dukkhametaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā.
an9.34:2.6: Imināpi kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sukhaṃ nibbānaṃ. (1)
an9.34:3.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:3.2: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno iminā vihārena viharato vitakkasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:3.3: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, sukhino dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya yāvadeva ābādhāya;
an9.34:3.4: evamevassa te vitakkasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti. Svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:3.5: Yo kho panāvuso, ābādho dukkhametaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā.
an9.34:3.6: Imināpi kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sukhaṃ nibbānaṃ. (2)
an9.34:4.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā …pe… tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:4.2: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno iminā vihārena viharato pītisahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:4.3: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, sukhino dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya yāvadeva ābādhāya;
an9.34:4.4: evamevassa te pītisahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti. Svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:4.5: Yo kho panāvuso, ābādho dukkhametaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā.
an9.34:4.6: Imināpi kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sukhaṃ nibbānaṃ. (3)
an9.34:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:5.2: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno iminā vihārena viharato upekkhāsahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:5.3: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, sukhino dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya yāvadeva ābādhāya;
an9.34:5.4: evamevassa te upekkhāsahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti. Svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:5.5: Yo kho panāvuso, ābādho dukkhametaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā.
an9.34:5.6: Imināpi kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sukhaṃ nibbānaṃ. (4)
an9.34:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ananto ākāsoti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:6.2: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno iminā vihārena viharato rūpasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:6.3: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, sukhino dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya yāvadeva ābādhāya;
an9.34:6.4: evamevassa te rūpasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti. Svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:6.5: Yo kho panāvuso, ābādho dukkhametaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā.
an9.34:6.6: Imināpi kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sukhaṃ nibbānaṃ. (5)
an9.34:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma anantaṃ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:7.2: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno iminā vihārena viharato ākāsānañcāyatanasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:7.3: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, sukhino dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya yāvadeva ābādhāya;
an9.34:7.4: evamevassa te ākāsānañcāyatanasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti. Svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:7.5: Yo kho panāvuso, ābādho dukkhametaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā.
an9.34:7.6: Imināpi kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sukhaṃ nibbānaṃ. (6)
an9.34:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma, natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:8.2: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno iminā vihārena viharato viññāṇañcāyatanasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:8.3: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, sukhino dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya yāvadeva ābādhāya;
an9.34:8.4: evamevassa te viññāṇañcāyatanasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti. Svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:8.5: Yo kho panāvuso, ābādho dukkhametaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā.
an9.34:8.6: Imināpi kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sukhaṃ nibbānaṃ. (7)
an9.34:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:9.2: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno iminā vihārena viharato ākiñcaññāyatanasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:9.3: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, sukhino dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya yāvadeva ābādhāya;
an9.34:9.4: evamevassa te ākiñcaññāyatanasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti. Svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:9.5: Yo kho panāvuso, ābādho dukkhametaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā.
an9.34:9.6: Imināpi kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sukhaṃ nibbānaṃ. (8)
an9.34:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti. (9)
an9.34:11.1: Imināpi kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sukhaṃ nibbānan”ti.
